snippet.title: Pathfinder: Gallowspire Survivors - Official Reveal Trailer | PC Gaming Show 2023
snippet.description:
Pathfinder: Gallowspire Survivors is a roguelite survival game set within the Pathfinder fantasy world. Players will enter the legendary Tower of Darkness as one of three hero options to slay enemy hordes. Upgrade spells and weapons, overcome deadly bosses, and ultimately seal away the darkness for good. Pathfinder: Gallowspire Survivors is launching in 2023 for PC.

#SummerOfGaming
